Kylo Ren Wikipedia Kylo Ren From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search Star Wars character other uses see Kylo Kylo Ren Ben Solo Star Wars character Adam Driver as Kylo Ren in Star Wars Force Awakens First appearance Force Awakens Last appearance Rise Skywalker Created by George Lucas Lawrence Kasdan J J Abrams Michael Arndt Portrayed by Adam Driver Voiced by Adam Driver Disney Infinity Lego Star Wars Force Awakens Star Wars Rebels Matthew Wood Star Wars Battlefront II Star Wars Resistance Masked Roger Craig Smith Star Wars Battlefront II Unmasked Information Full name Ben Solo Species Human Gender Male Occupation Jedi Padawan formerly Supreme Leader First Order Master Knights Ren Affiliation Jedi Order formerly First Order Knights Ren Family Han Solo father Leia Organa mother Relatives Anakin Skywalker maternal grandfather Padm Amidala maternal grandmother Luke Skywalker maternal uncle Bail Organa adopted maternal grandfather Breha Organa adopted maternal grandmother Shmi Skywalker maternal great grandmother Homeworld Chandrila Kylo Ren fictional character in Star Wars franchise Introduced in film Star Wars Force Awakens he portrayed by Adam Driver Kylo Ren chosen name Ben Solo only son original Star Wars trilogy characters Han Solo Leia Organa Though trained by his uncle Luke Skywalker as Jedi he has been seduced dark side Force by Supreme Leader Snoke aspires be as powerful as his grandfather Darth Vader Ren master Knights Ren as well as commander later Supreme Leader First Order an organization spawned from former Galactic Empire He appears in Force Awakens Last Jedi will appear in Rise Skywalker as well as related media merchandising Contents Concept creation Character Appearances Feature films Force Awakens Last Jedi Rise Skywalker Related works promotional material Novels Comics Reception Family tree References Sources Further reading External links Concept creation edit Abrams requested that Ren s mask be designed be memorable child As late as March film s main antagonist was only known production team as Jedi Killer had gone through numerous unapproved design attempts same month Glyn Dillon s design character s costume was finally approved According Abrams design was meant be nod Vader mask concept designer Doug Chiang says that character takes on persona Vader haunt Luke According Force Awakens costume designer Michael Kaplan don t know if it was kind spaghetti type lines on it but next time J J came by that was we presented him he loved it Also silver in those lines kind reflects changes color with action know if he s standing in front fire see that so it almost brings into mask Driver s casting in film in an unnamed role was first announced on April Kylo Ren was first seen but still not named in second Force Awakens teaser trailer released by Lucasfilm on November wielding jagged red lightsaber with crossguard name Kylo Ren was revealed by Entertainment Weekly in Lucasfilm designed Topps style trading card mock up in December May Vanity Fair photo shoot by Annie Leibovitz confirmed that Driver would be portraying Kylo According other cast members Driver method actor which meant that he sometimes stayed in character on set as Ren left his mask on between scenes Driver explained that his goal was forget re in Star Wars treat it like any other job that s filled with moments problems from perspective characters living within film s universe Darth Vader real Character edit Abrams told Empire in August Kylo Ren not Sith He works under Supreme Leader Snoke powerful figure on Dark Side Force Abrams had previously told Entertainment Weekly that character came name Kylo Ren he joined group called Knights Ren Robbie Collin Telegraph described Ren as hot headed radicalised Dark Side jihadi whose red lightsaber splutters crackles as violently as his temper Abrams noted lightsaber something that he built himself as dangerous as fierce as ragged as character Telegraph also explains that Ren s wild erratic temper angsty instability make him dangerous Melissa Leon Daily Beast describes Ren s use Force as formidable citing his ability stop blaster shot mid air immobilize victims probe minds against will Kasdan told Entertainment Weekly in August ve written four Star Wars movies now s never been character quite like one that Adam plays think re going see something that s brand new saga noting that character full emotion Abrams explained think that makes Ren so unique that he isn t as fully formed as we meet character such as Darth Vader He not prototypical mustache twirling bad guy He little bit more complex than that Driver said in December that despite visual similarities Darth Vader Ren unlike any villain franchise has seen He explained feel s recklessness about him that s maybe not normally associated with Dark Side normally think order structure full commitment no hesitation he s just little bit more unpolished It s in his costume in his lightsaber kind get sense that it could just not work at any moment that it could just blow up That s kind like big metaphor him Appearances edit Model Kylo s cross bladed lightsaber on display at Star Wars Launch Bay at Disney s Hollywood Studios Feature films edit Force Awakens edit Main article Star Wars Force Awakens Kylo Ren first appears in Force Awakens as commander in First Order tyrannical regime that has risen from remains Galactic Empire After arriving at Jakku retrieve map containing coordinates Luke Skywalker be found Ren kills an old priest known as Lor San Tekka captures Resistance pilot Poe Dameron has also been sent recover map by General Leia Organa Ren soon learns that pilot had entrusted his astromech droid BB with map Poe flees with help rogue stormtrooper Finn later finds BB scavenger Rey Finn Rey BB escape Jakku in Millennium Falcon are soon intercepted by ship s former owner Han Solo his co pilot Chewbacca It revealed that Ren son Han Leia originally named Ben was once one Luke s Jedi pupils He was corrupted dark side Force by First Order s Supreme Leader Snoke He then helped destroy his uncle Luke s new Jedi Academy However Ren still feels pull light side Force seeks strength overcome it from his grandfather Darth Vader whose burnt helmet in Ren s possession Arriving at Maz Kanata s castle on Takodana Ren captures Rey he senses has seen map While interrogating her he realizes that she strong with Force though unaware it Rey finds herself able resist his powers experience Ren s emotions confronts him over his fear that he will never be as powerful as his grandfather She later uses Jedi mind trick compel her stormtrooper guard let her escape Han arrives at First Order s superweapon Starkiller Base as part Resistance s plan destroy it After Han plants explosives destroy base he confronts Ren calling him by his real name Ben implores him abandon dark side warning him that Snoke will kill him once he accomplishes his goal seize control galaxy Ren tells Han he feels conflicted asks his father help which Han promises give Ren then ignites his lightsaber impaling killing Han An enraged Chewbacca fires at Ren wounding him As Finn Rey flee damaged base Ren follows confronts them Finn fights Ren with Luke s recovered lightsaber but Ren overpowers severely wounds him Rey then takes up lightsaber using Force begins overcome Ren striking him on face with lightsaber Before duel finished they are separated by seismic fissure created by collapsing base Rey others escape as Snoke orders General Hux evacuate base bring Ren him complete his training Last Jedi edit Main article Star Wars Last Jedi Ren s inner conflict continues into Last Jedi particularly through his conversations with Rey with whom he connects through Force Rey learns from Luke Ben Solo turned dark side Luke had seen vision destruction Ben would cause was briefly tempted kill him Ben awoke see Luke with his lightsaber drawn he turned on his uncle destroyed Jedi Temple Rey believes that still good in Ren resolves bring him back light side Meanwhile Ren reproached by Snoke his failure defeat Rey Ren tries prove himself by leading an attack on lead Resistance starship He hesitates destroy it after sensing his mother s presence but his wing man destroy ship s bridge almost killing Leia Upon Rey s arrival Ren captures her brings her Snoke tortures her Luke s location before ordering Ren kill her Instead complying Ren uses Force ignite Luke s lightsaber at Snoke s side cut him in half subsequently slays Snoke s royal guard with Rey s assistance After guards are slain Ren reveals Rey his goal create new order in galaxy separate from legacies created by Snoke Luke beseeches Rey join him He forces her acknowledge that her parents abandoned her tells her that he only one truly cares about her Rey refuses join him realizing that Ren will not turn back light side two briefly struggle over Luke s lightsaber with Force resulting in weapon breaking in half knocking both warriors unconscious After Rey escapes Ren frames her Snoke s assassination Force chokes General Hux into acknowledging him as new Supreme Leader First Order orders his forces attack Resistance base on Crait During attack Luke appears heavily fired upon then personally attacked by Ren Luke remains standing revealing that he only present as Force projection serving as distraction allow Resistance escape from First Order After Luke vanishes First Order storms base but Resistance has already evacuated Ren shares final look with Rey through Force before Rey slams door Millennium Falcon escapes with Resistance Rise Skywalker edit Main article Star Wars Rise Skywalker Kylo Ren will appear in Rise Skywalker with Adam Driver reprising his role Knights Ren will also appear in film Related works promotional material edit Kylo playable character in Force Awakens add on Disney Infinity video game with an Infinity character figurine available separately He also character in strategy video game Star Wars Force Arena Hasbro has released inch cm Kylo Ren action figure inch cm figure in Black Series line He also featured in Lego Star Wars playsets Kylo Ren s Command Shuttle Battle on Takodana as well as Lego Buildable Figure Lego version Kylo also appears in short form animated series Lego Star Wars Resistance Rises as playable character in Lego Star Wars Force Awakens In January Driver reprised role Star Wars Undercover Boss sketch on Saturday Night Live with Kylo Ren disguising himself as radar technician named Matt determine Starkiller Base employees really think him Kylo appears in Star Wars Battlefront II voiced by Matthew Wood Roger Craig Smith masked unmasked respectively In game Kylo interrogates Del Meeko about Lor San Tekka s location possess map Luke Skywalker using his Force abilities Del finally relents reveals map Lor San Tekka s location Kylo leaves him Hask Del s former comrade in Inferno Squad Kyle Ren also appears in Star Wars Resistance voiced once again by Matthew Wood also portrayed General Grievous in prequels Star Wars Clone Wars He also one numerous voices heard in fourth final season Star Wars Rebels in episode World Between Worlds with Driver reprising his role Novels edit Kylo Ren point view character in novelization Force Awakens by Alan Dean Foster In Chuck Wendig novel Star Wars Aftermath Empire s End Ben Solo b stated as having been born on planet Chandrila on same day as peace treaty signed between remnants Empire New Galactic Republic about year after Return Jedi years before Force Awakens Kylo Ren also mentioned in novel Star Wars Phasma which takes place before Force Awakens Comics edit author prequel era comic series about Darth Vader Charles Soule wrote comic titled Rise Kylo Ren which will be released on December tell story Ben Solo became Kylo Ren Reception edit Adam Driver received positive reviews his performance as Kylo Ren Driver won Saturn Award Best Supporting Actor his portrayal In January Kylo was voted seventh greatest movie villain all time by readers Empire Many reviewers complimented Ren s conflicted nature depth as well as his costume design noted were many places character could be taken in future installments Peter Bradshaw Guardian praised character actor alike saying He gorgeously cruel spiteful capricious unlike Vader old he given petulant temper tantrums with his lightsaber drawn Terri Schwartz IGN also called Driver s performance spectacular noting that his performance adds great depth character could have come off as one dimensional implications his arc leave viewer with plenty think about after they leave theater Collin wrote describe Kylo Ren as this film s Vader would be accurate in sense But it would also be undersell deep ingenuity with which this astonishing character has been crafted by Abrams Kasdan Arndt also wells emotional tumult Driver invests in him Comparing character one note Vader film Melissa Leon calls Ren living battleground between darkness light making him far more resonant familiar portrayal that struggle than we ve ever seen in Star Wars which makes him far more interesting villain Abrams told Entertainment Weekly it was great joy work with Adam Driver on this role he threw himself into it in deep remarkable way Todd McCarthy Hollywood Reporter noted Ren given pronounced inferiority complex clever bad guy twist that could be taken interesting places both in writing performance Peter Travers Rolling Stone wrote bald faced attempt clone Vader one greatest badasses in film history clankingly obvious but Driver masked unmasked gives him hypnotic haunting contours Kyle Buchanan Vulture com was underwhelmed by reveal Driver under mask Leon however argued But that face that normal vulnerable young man most subversively terrifying thing about J J Abrams reimagining New Hope Rather than pure evil Ren something far more familiar He human Just like real life young men with minds clouded by fear hate anger commit unspeakable acts in our world every day all visual cues that leave character open criticisms not being evil enough are all signs Ren s struggle between Dark Side Light Some viewers noted that Ren s character arc shares similarities with that Star Wars Expanded Universe character Jacen Solo son Han Solo Princess Leia threatens galaxy as fallen Jedi Additionally critics have noted resemblance between Ren s character design that Revan protagonist Knights Old Republic Family tree edit See also Solo family v t e Skywalker family tree Aika Lars n Cliegg Lars Shmi Skywalker n Jobal Naberrie n Ruwee Naberrie n Beru Whitesun Owen Lars Anakin Skywalker Padm Amidala Bail Organa n Breha Organa n Luke Skywalker n Leia Organa Han Solo Ben Solo n Notes Appears in Pablo Hidalgo s Star Wars Character Encyclopedia Updated Expanded Anakin was conceived without biological father b Attack Clones Revenge Sith Adopted father Leia Organa as established in Revenge Sith Adopted mother Leia Organa as established in Revenge Sith In non canonical Star Wars Expanded Universe Legends Luke married Mara Jade has son Ben Skywalker In Legends continuity Han Leia have three children Jaina Jacen Anakin Solo References edit Footnotes Presumably but not explicitly stated be named after Obi Wan Ben Kenobi known this child s name Ben he takes his father s last name even as
